boardgame.name: DreadBall Kick Off: Das futuristische Sportspiel
DreadBall Kick Off: Das futuristische Sportspiel
DreadBall: The Futuristic Sports Game
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DreadBall: The Futuristic Sports Game is the hyper-kinetic sci-fi sports game of unparalleled speed and ferocity _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a fast, fun and tactical miniature sports board game written by Jake Thornton and created by Mantic Games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two coaches compete for victory with teams of beautiful miniatures on a stunning sci-fi pitch. The game is easy to learn, yet challenging, with carefully orchestrated plays and counter attacks hinging on positioning and the mercy of the dice gods._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Created by the finest sculptors, artists and game designers, DreadBall: The Futuristic Sports Game is the first in a series of visually stunning sci-fi sports games, to be supported with expansions introducing new teams and exciting new game play, building on the already impressive 84-page full-colour A4 rulebook._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cubepushers - Episode 4: Let the Nerd-Rage Flow

Meeples _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Miniatures - Episode 97 - Bolt Action _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dropzone Commander (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dreadball)
Podcast: Diógenes Busca Juego 03 – Guerra de Miniaturas
The First Roll - What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s New on Kickstarter? - Episode 63: Sunday, July 24th

listing.notes: For auction winner musicalchalupa only This is the striker edition with all stretch rewards from that pledge level. Currently I have the base game and shipment 1 of the stretch rewards which will be shipped on payment. Shipment 2 is scheduled for Q1/Q2 of 2013 and shipment 3 for Q3 of 2013. Future shipments will be sent free of charge once they are received. Overall this is the list of what you will receive with all three shipments. A copy of DreadBall (2 additional Orx and 2 additional humans added. Ref added) Special edition Acrylic Counters (these are a kickstarter exclusive) 2 sprues of hex bases (48 bases) Midgard Delvers team Skittersneak Stealers team 6 additional Veer-myn players 6 additional Forge Father players 4 additional human players 4 additional Orx players 2 Season 2 female corporation players 2 Season 2 Judwan players 2 Season 2 Z_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;zor Players 2 Season 2 Robot players 1 prone FF model 1 prone veer-myn model 1 Marauder prone model 1 Corporation prone model 1 Female Corporation prone model 1 Robot prone model 1 Judwan prone model 1 Z_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;zor prone model 2 Season 3 Asterian players 2 Season 3 Nameless players 2 Season 3 Zees players 2 Teraton players Lucky Logan MVP Slippery Joe MVP Gorim Ironstone MVP Reek Rolat MVP Wildcard MVP John Doe MVP Number 88 MVP The Enforcer MVP Buzzcut MVP Kickstarter exclusive* Wyn Greth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;zki MVP Mee-kel Judwan, Superstar Sportsman – Season 2 MVP Z’zor MVP - Season 2 MVP Kickstarter exclusive* Nightshade Season 2 MVP Anne-Marie Helder – Female Human Season 2 MVP DBR-7 Prototype, Robot Season 2 MVP Yurik “Painmaster” Yurikson, Forge Father Guard Season 2 MVP Mellisandra - Asterian Season 2 MVP Rico Van Dien Season 2 MVP Riller, Zee Season 3 MVP Blaine, Season 4 MVP Kickstarter exclusive* Coach Renton Multi-hex player of your choice A signed print of the cover art A digital copy of the rules A digital copy of the DreadBall Season 2 rules A digital copy of the Season 3 rules A digital “Creating DreadBall” book Your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone Free ticket to a future DreadBall event (will now be signed by Ronnie) DreadBall Trophy (this is a kickstarter exclusive) Decal sheet 103 MODELS
DreadBall: The Futuristic Sports Game English first edition Publisher: Mantic Games Single Teams also available !
For auction winner eagle188
New, unassembled. Includes the special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;launch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; star player. I will ship at cost and combine. Payment through bank transfer within the Euro zone or with paypal.

Payment can be made through secure order form at www.spiritgames.co.uk or by Paypal (salnphil@spiritgames.co.uk £1 fee, invoice on request) UK Postage £5.00 First Class Overseas Postage at cost - please email us. There is a discount for larger games or several game bought together: 5% over £50 total games value 10% over £100 total games value Max UK Postage £5.00. The postage above is at cost (for Sale goods) but the maximum £5.00 for UK still applies.
Reserved for Tatsu

This was the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;striker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; level of the game from the kickstarter at : http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1744629938/dreadball-the-futuristic-sports-game The box was opened but the game was never played at all. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve received all the add-ons that came to this level but I did not purchase any of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;extras_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;. You can see that I paid $150 for it on the kickstarter and I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t think I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ever play it, so I would like to sell it for $100. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include the PDF_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s of the season 2 and season 3 books that came with it.
2 players (Mantic) Languages: English

is is a huge bundle of Dreadball Kickstarter stuff. It is a great game, but I have no one to play it with. All total, it includes the following (kickstater prices are in parentheses) KS Striker Pledge ($150) Complete your teams season 1 ($20) Complete your teams season 2 ($85) Complete your teams season 3 ($85) Season 2 Rulebook ($10) Season 3 Rulebook ($10) 8 Extra Sprues of Acrylic Bases ($32) this is enough to cover all miniatures 8 players each from the original four teams have been washed, had their mold lines cleaned up and glued together. Everything else is still unassembled in like new condition
Reserved for tobyjason http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/168126/item/3012341#item3012341

This is a STRIKER pledge from the original DREADBALL KICKSTARTER 2012 campaign ( https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1744629938/dreadball-the-futuristic-sports-game ) plus two additional teams _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;JUDWAN_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;NAMELESS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;QUADRANT ZERO STADIUM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; MDF pitch (unpainted). Some Specifics: - I chose the NAMELESS SPAWN (GIANT) - There are 6 playable teams in total included in this package (TRONTEK 29ers, GREENMOON SMACKERS, MIDGARD DELVERS, SKITTERSNEAK STEALERS, PELGAR MYSTICS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; KALIMARIN ANCIENTS) Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a list of all the included MVP_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s .. Lucky Logan MVP Slippery Joe MVP Gorim Ironstone MVP Reek Rolat MVP Wildcard MVP John Doe MVP Number 88 MVP The Enforcer MVP Buzzcut MVP Kickstarter exclusive* Wyn Greth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;zki MVP Mee-kel Judwan, Superstar Sportsman – Season 2 MVP Z’zor MVP - Season 2 MVP Kickstarter exclusive* Nightshade Season 2 MVP Anne-Marie Helder – Female Human Season 2 MVP DBR-7 Prototype, Robot Season 2 MVP Yurik “Painmaster” Yurikson, Forge Father Guard Season 2 MVP Mellisandra - Asterian Season 2 MVP Rico Van Dien Season 2 MVP Riller, Zee Season 3 MVP Blaine, Season 4 (DBX) MVP This copy has been played a couple of times upon release but after the initial burst of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;new game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; excitement I found I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have the time or energy to make weekly League events or tournaments. Many of the miniatures remain un-handled still in their sealed bags. Please ask me any questions if you need to know any specific details, but I will try and add photos here in time. UK(only) delivery= £9.10 -OR- FREE to collect *No additional fees (ie: Paypal).
This is a special auction item for MCollier

2012 Mantic Games. The game has been opened but unplayed. The box bottom suffered moderate to heavy creasing, but everything inside the box is unopened and like new. This lot will include five additional teams (four in good condition, one incomplete).

THIS LISTING IS RESERVED FOR RidiQles. DO NOT PURCHASE UNLESS THAT IS YOUR USERNAME. Not the game itself, but the following miniatures for the game: Female Corporation 7 Figures: 1 Guard, 2 Jacks, 3 Strikers, 1 Prone -----One Striker is broken at the ankle, but appears repairable with a dab of glue. Z_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;zor 8 Figures: 2 Guards, 2 Jacks, 3 Strikers, 1 Prone Asterians 2 Figures: 1 Striker, 1 Guard Teratons 2 Figures: 1 Guard, 1 Jack Nameless 4 Figures: 3 Strikers, 1 Sticky Guard -----One Striker is metal. -----Both plastic Strikers have a broken tail. (I re-glued one plastic Striker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tail and it shouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t show at all after painting. I have the broken tail for the second, but it may require a small amount of green stuff modeling putty to repair.) All of these are unplayed/unassembled. Clear plastic bases are included for all but the prone figures. Shipping is $5 to Southern California.

I still have my kickstarter version of dreadball. It has never been used and all the miniatures are unopened in their original packaging. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not looking to turn a profit, just hoping to make someone happy with the purchase (pledge was Striker for a total backed of 215). Includes the base game and all the stretch goals. As it is quite a lot of material to sort through (with no knowledge of what is what) and a long time ago i am not 100% clear on the extras added, but looking at the page and a quick glance it would seem to be: 2 extra teams cheerleaders I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to make pictures, throw me a pm if interested.
Both teams part painted. Includes referee figure. Great condition.
